subject: Re: [junit] German book on Junit and test first ready for review
msgSnippet: ... Another suggestion: Brian Marick s notes on his testing for developers course can be of some help as well: http://www.testing.com/writings.html Johannes
messageBody:
> Suggestions? Essentially all of the testing books I have ever read suck
> or don't cover object-oriented code using test first.

Another suggestion: Brian Marick's notes on his testing for developers
course can be of some help as well: http://www.testing.com/writings.html

Johannes
